message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with the evaluation of statistical machine translation, which is a subfield of natural language processing. Additionally, the paper proposes an SMT evaluation technique that enhances the BLEU metric to consider variations in human translation, which is a common research area in cs.CL. 

The paper may also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as machine translation is a subfield of AI. 

Furthermore, the paper may be relevant to cs.LG (Machine Learning) as statistical machine translation is a machine learning technique. 

The paper may also be relevant to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as machine translation is often used in information retrieval systems. 

Finally, the paper may be relevant to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) as neural machine translation is a popular approach in SMT and is a subfield of neural computing.
